headline: Good Company
pros: The people at the company are amazing and all treat each other like family. Throughout the year they host many events for the employees. They also promote from within first and then give them opportunities to those outside the company.
cons: The freight industry is tough so you are constantly under tremendous pressure, which is more an issue outside of the company but the pay is not the best.

headline: Great Place to Work
pros:
Opportunity for growth
Good environment
Open door policy
cons: Health and overall benefits could be better

headline: Import coordinator
pros:
Experience
Flexibility using your PTO
Schedule
Birthday lunch
Cigarette break
cons:
-Bad pay
-It's like being in high school again
-Instead of team work it's every man for themselves
-Management only cares about flirting
-management don't have no clue on how to deal with conflict

headline: Very displeased with the company.
pros: SOME of the co-workers there were great to work with. Not a bad location for the office.
cons: This place went in the dumps when they got new management from LA to run Chicago.  Worst mistake ever.  Also now Ecu-Line  good luck all!

headline: Was a great opportunity until Ecu-Line came aboard
pros: Great product, full benefits, Tuition help
cons: no support from management, no room to move.

headline: Customer Service Rep
pros: Great atmosphere. Family vibe and they provide a small holiday bonus at the end of the year

headline: Decent place to work
pros: Relaxing atmosphere but sometimes fast paced
cons: Micro managing from supervisors at times, but most it is okay

headline: Sales representative
pros: Career advancement opportunities is good, the company was purchased by multinational corporation and have lots of opportunities.
cons: Tons of rules, forces you to sale their product their way, even if you have a proven method.

headline: Good Work Environment
cons: Salary is not competitive, always want more of the employees for less
